alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 6:56AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Harrison, southeastern Floyd, central Meade, southwestern Jefferson and northwestern Bullitt Counties through 730 AM EST... At 655 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brandenburg, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valley Station, Pleasure Ridge Par, Shively, Hollyvilla, St. Dennis, Fairdale and Louisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
